name: Sprigguns Ship Exblower
text:
2+ Level 8 monsters
You can choose 1 opponent's Monster Zone or Spell & Trap Zone; detach any number of materials from this card, and if you do, destroy that many cards your opponent controls that are in the chosen zone and/or in the Monster Zones or Spell & Trap Zones to the top, bottom, or adjacent to the chosen zone. During your opponent's Main or Battle Phase (Quick Effect): You can banish this card until the End Phase. You can only use each effect of "Sprigguns Ship Exblower" once per turn.
